title: Handkerchief, 1900–50
medium:
Medium: cotton on linen
Technique: satin, stem and couching stitches with areas of deflected element work on a plain weave foundation
description: Handkerchief with a design of a large circel filled with profiles of flower heads and semi-circular sprays of flowers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Handkerchief, 1900–50.
1900–50. Medium: cotton on linen
Technique: satin, stem and couching stitches with areas of deflected element work on a plain weave foundation. Gift of Stanley Herzman. 1976-92-2.
